about_the_game:
The Astec experimental DEMO is a sequel to the game Bythzkel Sombrea which takes place 20 years later in the events of soldier Bythzkel Astec is very different it does not present itself in the same way as that of the first it is almost shown with a VR view This game is independent since I designed it myself so you should outsmart the Mayans to avoid further infestation and free the prisoners who are in the areas and in the villages.

The demo includes a version of the game that's unique, but it's precisely the gameplay that should be different. The demo's gameplay is more limited than the game's, and it doesn't include all the levels. And with the game's customization system for the included levels, you can press the tab key on your keyboard to display the second menu, which lets you change the level you're playing as you like.

Rotasolok gnileté Minakolok ritasak guinaka manihok sotosa-rathak.

Gameplay and understanding of the game itself either you must play on the keyboard or VR Occulus to move the characters you control.
when you install the DEMO completely it will ask you to confirm the game folder because I have integrated the tilesets and a rather special rendering you will have to accept without respite the folder indicated when starting the DEMO.

Game on the multilingual and gameplay and french for english main menu translate text from french and english.

The game Bythzkel Sombréa and of Béta-Alpha no finish please report bug or one revification a developper.
detailed_description:
The Astec experimental DEMO is a sequel to the game Bythzkel Sombrea which takes place 20 years later in the events of soldier Bythzkel Astec is very different it does not present itself in the same way as that of the first it is almost shown with a VR view This game is independent since I designed it myself so you should outsmart the Mayans to avoid further infestation and free the prisoners who are in the areas and in the villages.

The demo includes a version of the game that's unique, but it's precisely the gameplay that should be different. The demo's gameplay is more limited than the game's, and it doesn't include all the levels. And with the game's customization system for the included levels, you can press the tab key on your keyboard to display the second menu, which lets you change the level you're playing as you like.

Rotasolok gnileté Minakolok ritasak guinaka manihok sotosa-rathak.

Gameplay and understanding of the game itself either you must play on the keyboard or VR Occulus to move the characters you control.
when you install the DEMO completely it will ask you to confirm the game folder because I have integrated the tilesets and a rather special rendering you will have to accept without respite the folder indicated when starting the DEMO.

Game on the multilingual and gameplay and french for english main menu translate text from french and english.

The game Bythzkel Sombréa and of Béta-Alpha no finish please report bug or one revification a developper.
name: Astec Experimental Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Window,10,11
  • Processor: Intel Core I5 6400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 970 4GO
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek hd sound
  • VR Support: VR OCCULUS
  • Additional Notes: SSD requied
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10,11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 4100
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD R9 390 8GO
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Hd sound blaster
  • VR Support: VR OCCULUS
  • Additional Notes: SSD requied
